$WmMPID_サーリャ,ch04_10_Sallya_F_Normal,Face|I know what lurks beneath those
smiles of yours... I know better
than to trust a dark mage...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_Normal,Face|Hah! Would you be surprised to learn
that this is how I always look?$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|A little Plegian darkness lurks within
all three of us... Shall we let it out?$k$p
